attributes.action: Removal of alcohol bars from the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
A guide for employers on alcohol at work Date of publication:
1996 Series code:
INDG240
This leaflet is aimed at all employers and looks at alcohol-related problems in the workplace.

It describes the effects of alcohol and how much alcohol you can drink safely. It also provides a four-step approach for employers for tackling problems related to alcohol. It contains a checklist and uses case studies to illustrate successful solutions to this problem.
attributes.background: As we have seen lately sexual abuse and bullying of Junior members of staff in the house is unacceptable. this would help as no good decisions are made with alcohol involved.
